comment: I took Dr. Titu for ECE 7706 and I had a very tough time. While I liked her as a person, she was not my favorite professor. She is a very tough grader and does not grade anything until it is too late to fix. She was not very accessible and when she did answer, it confused me more. I would take another professor if I had to retake this course.

I personally really liked Dr. Titu. Her class was a combination of her reading from PPT slides and hands-on activities. She is really nice and willing to help if you have questions. Very light work load and relatively easy material. I recommend her!

She was absolutely amazing! This course was clearly laid out and she was always willing to help with anything! The online course does have a lot of work that is time-consuming but it is not difficult. I will always recommend this professor!

Avoid this professor one of the worst professors I have ever taken at KSU. So many long assignments and unwilling to help and demeans you and makes you feel like an idiot when you do come to her for help.

She has very clear instructions, many of the assignments follow the same format, so it will be like that for the full semester. I suppose that helped me with planning. Some assignments were tricky, but nothing is unmanageable in her class.

Professor Titu is nice and caring and organizes the course materials well. But, some stuff and activities were repetitive and can be boring. Lots of redundant homework and attendance is required to finish the lab reports and get better grades.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: Dr Titu is very knowledgeable about her subject. Shes caring towards her students and finds different ways to help you out. Although attendance is not mandatory its important to go to class to participate in the labs because those are graded.

It wasn't her fault that the material was so lengthy and too complicated for elementary science, but she made it predictable. It was the same format every week, basically the same as ISCI2001 but with physics. The material was tough but everything was open note. Tests are all open response and timed so you have to understand it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: It's important to attend class to participate in labs and to learn the material, but there's not a ton of homework. She understands we have other classes and jobs. Wording on some test questions could be confusing, but she was pretty good at explaining the content in class. She's great at getting you into the mindset of teaching your own students.

This class was an difficult course made easy. I enjoyed getting to work at an easy pace to understand what I was learning. Dr. Titu made the course enjoyable with her inspirational messages and easy to read feedback. Make sure that you take notes on the modules because it is important for quizzes and tests in the future. Easy course, don't miss it!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT
